messages.message: Hey @Chris Cowell - it seems like the other 2 files operations vanished again in the documentation page, am I missing something?
@subbu You’re right, thanks for pointing that out. The original fix I made wasn’t sufficient but I see the problem and will fix it.
@subbu & @Lucile Those operations are back in the production docs again, and we’re making a more thorough plan to make sure we don’t have those regressions again.

@Lucile The info about custom keys starts at line 694 of the latest version of the `openapi.yaml`. The latest version is always available at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/instabase/aihub-openapi/refs/heads/master/openapi.yaml. Maybe they have an old version?
@Chris Cowell why is this issue happening?
@Anil pins to old `openapi.yaml` submodule hashes are sneaking into commits to `instabase-fern`. As a team we’re discussing the right workflow to prevent this.
